entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible account enumeration in reset password #54653
  • Performance with many Blazor Assemblies #54652
  • Add support for OpenAPI document filters #54650
    9.0-preview4
  • Blazor: can't pass reference to element when hosted in shadow DOM #54648
  • Hybrid Cache API proposal #54647
    .NET 9 Planning
  • JSInvokableAttribute - No details on where the issue is. Undebuggable. #54646
  • Issue with Dot Net Core MVC #54645
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid fails with "BLAZOR106: The JS module file wwwroot/_content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.QuickGrid/QuickGrid.razor.js' was defined but no associated razor component or view was found for it." #54644
  • Auto-referenced packages gets added to packages.lock.json for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly #54643
  • SecurityTokenInvalidIssuerException: IDX10204: Unable to validate issuer. validationParameters.ValidIssuer is null or whitespace AND validationParameters.ValidIssuers is null or empty. #54640
  • DataProtectorTokenProvider does not implement TimeProvider #54639
  • Perf regression: caching #54638
  • Some APIs do not verify the TOKNE expiration date #54635
  • RFC 6238 Two-Factor Authentication service fails on .NET Framework 4.8 #54634
  • Questions around PersistentComponentState in Blazor #54633

Closed

  • NavigationManager.NavigateToLogout() stuck on authentication/logout-callback after upgrade to dotnet 8 #53131
    8.0.x
  • Blazor WASM MSAL Published Application Gets Stuck on "Completing Login" #52619
    9.0-preview3
  • Error when serializing InteractiveRequestOptionsSerializerContext #52291
    .NET 9 Planning
  • .NET 8 preview7 Blazor WASM AAD authentication ends with There was an error trying to log you in: '"undefined" is not valid JSON' #49956
    8.0.x
  • Reload the browser when the circuit ID is unknown #9256
    Backlog
  • PasswordValidator shall support "RequiredCharTypes" #49896
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: mvc #54624
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #54637
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #54625
  • dotnet new webapi template : package reference Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version isn't the last one #52246
    Backlog
  • [NETSDKE2E]warning CS8618: Non-nullable property 'Http' must contain a non-null value when exiting constructor when building blazorWasm project. #54603

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to 1ES templates #54651
    area-infrastructure
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during JS interop #54225
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Simplify Publishing.props #54566
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [release/2.1] Convert to 1es pipelines #54628
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • Pass -nativeToolsOnMachine #54622
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Update branding to preview4 #54630
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Limit parallelism of forced key ring refreshes #54627
    area-dataprotection
  • fix: remove double logging of BadHttpRequest errors #54395
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer #54492
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • Increase logs and delays in CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54608
    area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Improve route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54479
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Java discovery in helix-matrix pipeline #54631
    area-infrastructure
  • add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #54508
    area-mvc
